name: Egg-celerate
description:
Egg-celerate is the game I have made for the Pygame-community spring game jam in 2023. 

You play as the Easter bunny, who has been challenged by Mr. Time to get to the top of the world, otherwise Easter will be erased from the calendar for ever. Luckily the Easter bunny was an ex navy seal and had some left over explosive eggs from his past missions.

The github repo:

https://github.com/YeatsAiden/Egg-celerate

The controls are:

Arrow keys, W, A, S, D , space bar, and the mouse.

Usefull Tip:

Use your gamer intuition to propel your self to victory.
